sourcesContent:
Cookings!!!

{{cooking.title}}

Description: {{cooking.description}}

Difficulty: {{cooking.difficulty}}

Nearest cost of products: {{cooking.nearestCost}}

Price: {{cooking.price}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ICooking } from 'src/app/ICooking'; import { CookingService } from 'src/app/cooking.service'; import { DetailsComponent } from '../details/details.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cookings', templateUrl: './cookings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cookings.component.css'] }) export class CookingsComponent implements OnInit { cookings: ICooking[] = []; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService, detailsComponent: DetailsComponent) {} getCookings(): void { this.cookingService.getAllCookings().subscribe(cooks => this.cookings = cooks); } goToDetails(id: string){ this.detailsComponent.getCooking(this.cookings.find(x => x.id === id)!); } ngOnInit() : void { this.getCookings(); } }
